resources.string: Subscriptions are recurring. You will be automatically be billed through your Google Play Store Account, if you have enrolled for a trail you will be charged real money when the trail ends. Your subscription will auto-renew unless you cancel. You can manage your subscription in the settings in the Google Play Store

Our subscriptions only offers Ads removal in the App for the period of the subscription you chose, we have two subscription: 7 Days and 1 Month and the prices may differ per country, Please check them above.

Showing examples of all in-app purchases using the latest Google Play Billing Library, The app has covered
----------------

1: Multiple subscriptions.

2: One time purchase (Non-Consumable purchase).

3: Unlimited purchases (Consumable purchases).

5: Remove Ads purchase.

6: Restore owned purchase button.

7: Auto subscription check and activate.

The source code has the following.
----------------

1: Multiple subscriptions.

2: One time purchase (Non-Consumable purchase).

3: Unlimited purchases (Consumable purchases).

5: Remove Ads purchase.

6: Restore owned purchase button.

7: Auto subscription check and activate.

8: Billing Library Version 7.0.0

Once you buy the Life time Purchase below, you will be able to Download the Complete App Source Code and you own it for lifetime. Free Future updates will be provided.

This screen is showing different product types. 
----------------

1: subscriptions.

2: One time purchase (Non-Consumable purchase).

3: Unlimited purchases (Consumable purchases).
